Package cryptotrader.trade

Interface UpdateTraderList

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TraderList
    public interface UpdateTraderList
    An interface that performs operations on the current list of trading brokers
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jackson Howe

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean addTrader​(TradingBroker newTrader)
      A method that adds a trading broker to the trader list
      TradingBroker removeTrader​(String brokerName)
      A method that removes a trading broker from the trader list
      boolean updateCoins​(String brokerName, ArrayList<String> newCoins)
      A method that updates the coin list of the specified trader
      boolean updateStrategy​(String brokerName, TradingStrategy strategy)
      A method that updates the strategy of the specified trader

    • Method Detail

      • addTrader

        boolean addTrader​(TradingBroker newTrader)
        A method that adds a trading broker to the trader list
        Parameters:
        newTrader - the trader to add to the list
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful, false if not

      • removeTrader

        TradingBroker removeTrader​(String brokerName)
        A method that removes a trading broker from the trader list
        Parameters:
        brokerName - name of the trader to remove
        Returns:
        the TradingBroker object representing the trading broker that was removed

      • updateCoins

        boolean updateCoins​(String brokerName,
                    ArrayList<String> newCoins)
        A method that updates the coin list of the specified trader
        Parameters:
        brokerName - name of the trader to update
        newCoins - list of coin names (tickers) that this trader is interested in
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful, false if not

      • updateStrategy

        boolean updateStrategy​(String brokerName,
                       TradingStrategy strategy)
        A method that updates the strategy of the specified trader
        Parameters:
        brokerName - name of the trader to update
        strategy - trading strategy object that this trader will use
        Returns:
        true if the operation is true, false if not
